summary: A unit‑test module that validates a single‑file variational autoencoder (VAE) model based on KL divergence, checking that the model can be loaded, handles image inputs, respects configuration arguments, integrates correctly with other components, and produces inference outputs identical to a pretrained reference.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and reproducibility of the VAE component used in image generation pipelines, supporting quality assurance and reliable deployment of diffusion‑based models.
